page.title: 02WORKING AROUND GRASSMOOR.
page.content: Most people from Grassmoor and Temple Normanton work away from their homes, usually 3 miles away in Chesterfield. There are farms, garages and shops providing employment but no factories or industries There is widespread land reclamation taking place but mainly construction engineers and workmen from out of the area are used. Servicing of machines is carried out at Corbriggs and the N.C.B. has its Area Workshops and Medical Centre at the site of the old Williamthorpe Colliery. In l985 a new road was built south of the colliery to give access to land set aside for an industrial estate. It is hoped that its proximity to the M1 Motorway will encourage firms to build there. So far no work has started and unemployment in the area remains high.
